pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Async Search Client⚠️ This project has been renamed to meilisearch-python-async and moved to the[meilisearch-python-async](https://github.com/sanders41/meilisearch-python-async) repository. All ofthe functionality remains the same in meilisearch-python-async and development continues from wherewhere this package left off. ⚠️
